tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE robotic_surgeries (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    surgical_procedure TEXT,
    surgeon_name TEXT,
    surgery_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE surgeries (
  surgery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  surgery_type VARCHAR(50),
  surgeon_name VARCHAR(50),
  surgery_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE images (
  image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  surgery_id INT REFERENCES surgeries(surgery_id),
  image_url VARCHAR(255),
  image_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE videos (
  video_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  surgery_id INT REFERENCES surgeries(surgery_id),
  video_url VARCHAR(255),
  video_duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE surgeries (
  surgery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  surgery_date DATE,
  procedure_name VARCHAR(100),
  surgeon_name VARCHAR(100),
  assistant_name VARCHAR(100)
);
